metadata.description: Specifies the name of the app.
Specifies the location for all resources.
The URL of your first Azure OpenAI endpoint in the following format: https://[name].openai.azure.com
The priority of your first OpenAI endpoint (lower number means higher priority)
The API key of your first OpenAI endpoint
The URL of your second Azure OpenAI endpoint in the following format: https://[name].openai.azure.com
The priority of your second OpenAI endpoint (lower number means higher priority)
The API key of your second OpenAI endpoint
